AMOUNT_ENOUGH_CURRENCY_FEE: 没有足够的 {symbol} 来支付交易费用
AMOUNT_IS_LESS_THAN_RESERVE: 收币账户需存储最低准备金的XRP{储备金}才能激活
AMOUNT_IS_MORE_THAN_RESERVE: 额度超过所需的未用准备金 ({reserve} XRP)
BACKUP_BACKUP_ALREADY_FAILED_DESCRIPTION: 之前尝试备份此设备失败。设备备份只能进行一次
BACKUP_BACKUP_ALREADY_FINISHED_DESCRIPTI: 你连接的设备已备份完成。请记下助记词并将其藏在安全的地方。
CUSTOM_FEE_NOT_IN_RANGE: 允许的费用介于 {minFee} 和 {maxFee} 之间
DATA_ETH_TOOLTIP: 数据会在你向合约发送交易的时候使用.
DESKTOP_OUTDATED_MESSAGE: 你的版本 {currentVersion} 和Github上的最新版本 {newVersion}不匹配
DESTINATION_TAG_EXPLAINED: 目的标签是一个随机数，作为你交易的唯一标识符，有些服务可能需要这个他来处理你的交易。.
DESTINATION_TAG_IS_NOT_NUMBER: 目的标签不是一个数字
DISCONNECT_DEVICE_DESCRIPTION: 您的设备已被擦除，不再持有私钥。.
FIRMWARE_CONNECT_IN_NORMAL_MODEL_1: 连接线缆时，请勿按住任何按钮.
FIRMWARE_CONNECT_IN_NORMAL_MODEL_2: 请确保你在连接设备时没有按住任何按钮。.
FIRMWARE_RECONNECTED_BL_NEXT_STEP_DESC: 在下一步，你的Trezor将要求你确认此固件更新。.
FIRMWARE_RECONNECT_BL_NEXT_STEP_DESC: 在下一步中，你将被要求在bootloader模式下连接你的设备。.
FIRMWARE_UPDATE_AVAILABLE_DESC: 我们一直在努力改善你Trezor的体验，以下是更改后的总结：
FIRMWARE_UPDATE_SUCCESS_DESC: 你的Trezor已安装了最新的固件。.
FW_CAPABILITY_UPDATE_REQUIRED_DESC: 固件需要更新，以便与 {networkName} 配合使用
LOCKTIME_DESCRIPTION: 允许你通过设置值来推迟交易 (time or block)
LOCKTIME_SCHEDULE_SEND_TOOLTIP: 锁定时间设置一个交易在区块中可被挖掘的最早时间或区块高度
LOG_DESCRIPTION: 在与我们的支持团队沟通后，会有一个包含很多技术信息的日志。
LOG_INCLUDE_BALANCE_DESCRIPTION: 如果你的问题与余额或交易无关，你可以关闭该功能。你的账户描述符(XPubs)将不会包含在复制的日志中。.
METADATA_MODAL_DESCRIPTION: 请选择一个云提供商来保存你的标签。你的数据是由OneKey加密的
METADATA_PROVIDER_AUTH_ERROR: 与云提供商 {provider} 同步标签数据失败，用户已注销
METADATA_PROVIDER_NOT_FOUND_ERROR: 无法在云提供商中找到元数据
METADATA_PROVIDER_UNEXPECTED_ERROR: 与云提供商 {provider} 同步标签数据失败，用户已注销
MODAL_ADD_ACCOUNT_DESC: 发送到属于特定账户的地址的交易集合。在下面的列表中找不到特定的币种？ {trezorCoinsUrl}
MODAL_ADD_ACCOUNT_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: 允许的最大账户数已被创建
NOTIFICATIONS_EMPTY_DESC: 您将在这里看到所有重要的通知
ONBOARDING_PAIR_ALREADY_INITIALIZED: 只有在你自己进行设置的情况下才能继续。如果别人设置了你的OneKey硬件设备，那么的资金可能会有风险。; 联系 OneKey 支持.
ONBOARDING_UNEXPECTED_DEVICE_DIFFERENT_H: 你使用的是不同的OneKey硬件设备
ONBOARDING_UNEXPECTED_DEVICE_DIFFERENT_P: 这不是你一直在使用的那个OneKey硬件设备。请重新连接正确的设备
如果你想使用此设备，请重新开始。.
PASSPHRASE_CASE_SENSITIVE: 注：密码口令是区分大小写的
RBF_DESCRIPTION: RBF允许在你想加快交易速度的情况下提升费用
RECEIVE_DESC_BITCOIN: 要获得任何资金，您需要获取新的收款地址。建议始终使用新的交易，因为这会阻止其他人跟踪您的交易。您可以重用一个地址，但是除非必要，否则我们建议您不要使用它。
RECEIVE_DESC_ETHEREUM: 也使用此地址来接收令牌。
SETTINGS_ADV_COIN_BLOCKBOOK_DESCRIPTION: 币的设置定义了连接 OneKey 时的发现过程，每次连接时都不记得设备。
SETTINGS_ADV_COIN_CONN_INFO_NO_CONNECTED: 尚未连接到服务端。尝试转到您的帐户概述以建立与服务端的连接。
SHAMIR_SEED_DESCRIPTION: 也可称为“Shamir backup”；⁠您可以将其隐藏在不同位置的多个单词列表，以提高安全性。
SINGLE_SEED_DESCRIPTION: 您的恢复种子将是单个英语单词列表。
TOAST_TX_CONFIRMED: 交易 {amount} 于账户 {account} 已成功确认
TR_3RD_PARTY_WALLETS_DESC: 这些币种受 OneKey 固件支持，但仅在外部钱包中。
TR_404_DESCRIPTION: 错误：非常抱歉，看起来像是错误的 URL 或断开的链接。
TR_ACCOUNT_DETAILS_TYPE_BECH32: Bech32 uses the most modern addresses for smallest transaction fees. Be aware that it may not be compatible with old bitcoin services.
TR_ACCOUNT_DETAILS_TYPE_P2PKH: Legacy Pay-to-Public-Key-Hash (P2PKH) is the basic type of transaction used in Bitcoin and other similar crypto currencies.
TR_ACCOUNT_DETAILS_TYPE_P2SH: Pay to script hash (P2SH) is an advanced type of transaction used in Bitcoin and other similar crypto currencies. Unlike P2PKH, it allows sender to commit funds to a hash of an arbitrary valid script.
TR_ACCOUNT_DETAILS_XPUB: Handle your account public key (xPUB) carefully. When exposed, a third party will be able to see your entire transaction history.
TR_ACCOUNT_EXCEPTION_AUTH_ERROR_DESC: 此设备的授权过程失败。 请单击 “重试” 或重新连接您的 OneKey 设备。
TR_ACCOUNT_EXCEPTION_DISCOVERY_DESCRIPTI: 我们无法找到您的帐户。
TR_ACCOUNT_EXCEPTION_DISCOVERY_EMPTY: 在设置中禁用了所有币种。
TR_ACCOUNT_EXCEPTION_DISCOVERY_EMPTY_DES: 您可以添加新帐户（启用所选币种）或在 “设置” 中启用任何币种。
TR_ACCOUNT_IMPORTED_ANNOUNCEMENT: A watch-only account is a public address you’ve imported into your wallet, allowing the wallet to watch for outputs but not spend them.
TR_ACCOUNT_IS_EMPTY_DESCRIPTION: 通过接收或购买 {network} 来展示记录。
TR_ACCOUNT_PASSPHRASE_DISABLED: Change passphrase settings to use this device
TR_ACQUIRE_DEVICE: 我要在当前页面使用 OneKey
TR_ACQUIRE_DEVICE_DESCRIPTION: 您的 OneKey 似乎正在另一个窗口中使用。请关闭所有其他可能正在使用 OneKey 的窗口或标签。
TR_ADDITIONAL_SECURITY_FEATURES: 同时，请确保您已完成以下所有安全步骤。
TR_ADDRESS_MODAL_BTC_DESCRIPTION: 建议对每笔交易使用一个新的地址，因为这有利于您的隐私。
TR_ADDRESS_MODAL_CHECK_ON_TREZOR: 在您的 OneKey 二次检查
TR_ADDRESS_MODAL_CHECK_ON_TREZOR_DESC: 请确保此处显示的地址与 OneKey 设备上显示的地址核对后是一致的。
TR_ADD_TOKEN_TOOLTIP: 输入一个 ERC20 代币合约地址
TR_ADVANCED_RECOVERY_NOT_SURE: 不确定高级方法如何工作？
TR_ADVANCED_RECOVERY_OPTION: 使用 OneKey 设备拼写出助记词的每个单词。
TR_ADVANCED_RECOVERY_TEXT: 根据 OneKey 屏幕上字母的显示位置，使用下面的键盘拼写恢复种子的每个单词。
TR_ALLOW_ANALYTICS_DESCRIPTION: 所有数据严格保持匿名；我们仅将其用于改善 OneKey 生态系统。
TR_ALL_THE_WORDS: 出于安全原因，总是在设备上输入单词，请以正确的顺序输入所有单词。
TR_AUTH_CONFIRM_FAILED_DESC: 不正确到 passphrase 确认信息.
TR_BACKUP_CHECKBOX_1_DESCRIPTION: 确保以正确的顺序记录了每个单词，确保您记录的助记词不会被弄湿或弄脏。
TR_BACKUP_CHECKBOX_2_DESCRIPTION: 请勿将种子保存在手机或任何可能被黑客入侵的设备（包括云服务）中。
TR_BACKUP_CHECKBOX_2_TITLE: 我永远不会制作电子副本或对助记词拍照
TR_BACKUP_CHECKBOX_3_DESCRIPTION: 将其隐藏好，并采取适当的防护措施，以确保您是唯一看到您的助记词的人。
TR_BACKUP_FINISHED_TEXT: 现在应该记下这些助记词，同时您的 OneKey 已经可以使用了。请记住，如果丢失了助记词，那您的资金将永远消失：无法恢复丢失的备份。确保执行以下所有步骤，以确保钱包的安全。
TR_BACKUP_RECOVERY_SEED_FAILED_DESC: 备份过程失败。强烈建议备份您的钱包。请查看文档以了解如何成功创建助记词来备份您的钱包。
TR_BACKUP_SEED_IS_ULTIMATE: 您的助记词是钱包和资金的钥匙。如果您丢失了它，它将永远消失：没有其他方法可以恢复丢失的钱包。
TR_BACKUP_SUBHEADING_1: 您的 OneKey 将生成一串单词列表，您需要手写下来它们。这些信息是保护 OneKey 的最重要部分：这是 OneKey 和与其关联的所有钱包的唯一脱机备份。
TR_BASIC_RECOVERY_OPTION: 在计算机上逐字输入恢复种子。
TR_BCH_ADDRESS_INFO: Bitcoin Cash changed the format of addresses to cashaddr. Find more info about how to convert your address on our blog. {TR_LEARN_MORE}
TR_BECH32_BANNER_POINT_1: Lowercase letters only = lower chance of any reviewing errors
TR_BECH32_BANNER_POINT_2: Efficient technology = pay up to 25% lower transactions fees
TR_BECH32_BANNER_TITLE: OneKey Suite 的新功能：BTC Bech32 帐户！
TR_BEFORE_ANY_FURTHER_ACTIONS: Before you perform the update, please make sure you have your recovery seed.
TR_BRIDGE_DEV_MODE_STOP: Starting OneKey Bridge on default port
TR_BRIDGE_SUBHEADING: OneKey Bridge facilitates the connection between your OneKey and your internet browser.
TR_BUY_DETAIL_ERROR_TEXT: Sorry, your transaction failed or was rejected. Your payment method was not charged.
TR_BUY_DETAIL_SUBMITTED_TEXT: Click the button below to finish entering your details at the provider's site.
TR_BUY_DETAIL_SUCCESS_TEXT: Your transaction was approved; please wait for it to finish.
TR_BUY_FOOTER_TEXT_1: Invity is a comparison tool that connects you to the best exchange providers. They only use location in order to show the most relevant offers.
TR_BUY_FOOTER_TEXT_2: Invity does not see any of your payment or KYC information; you share this only with the exchange provider if you choose to finish the transaction.
TR_BUY_I_UNDERSTAND: I understand and agree to all of the above
TR_BUY_NO_OFFERS: Sorry, none of our partners can provide an offer at this time.
TR_BUY_OTHER_OFFERS_IN: More offers available if you pay in
TR_BUY_RECEIVE_ACCOUNT_QUESTION_TOOLTIP: This is the account within your wallet where you'll find your coins once the transaction is finished.
TR_BUY_RECEIVE_ADDRESS_QUESTION_TOOLTIP: This is the specific alphanumeric address that will receive your coins. Verify this address on your OneKey.
TR_BUY_TERMS_1: You're here to buy cryptocurrency. If you were directed to this site for any other reason, please contact {provider} support before proceeding.
TR_BUY_TERMS_2: You're using this feature to purchase funds that will be sent to an account under your direct personal control.
TR_BUY_TERMS_3: You're not using this feature for gambling or any other violation of the provider's terms of service.
TR_BUY_TERMS_4: You understand that cryptocurrencies are an emerging financial tool and that regulations may be limited in some areas. This may put you at a higher risk of fraud, theft, or market instability.
TR_BUY_TERMS_5: You understand that cryptocurrency transactions are irreversible and you won’t be able to receive a refund for your purchase.
TR_BY_CREATING_WALLET: 创建钱包，即表示您同意我们的 {TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS}
TR_CAMERA_PERMISSION_DENIED: Permission to access the camera was denied.
TR_CHANGELOG_ON_GITHUB: 在 github 查看变更日志
TR_CHANGE_PIN_IN_SETTINGS: 在设置中更改 PIN 码
TR_CHECK_RECOVERY_SEED_DESCRIPTION: 执行模拟恢复以检查备份。
TR_CHECK_RECOVERY_SEED_DESC_T1: 在此处按照设备上显示的顺序输入种子中的单词。可能会要求您键入一些不属于恢复种子的单词，以作为其他安全措施。
TR_CHECK_RECOVERY_SEED_DESC_T2: Your wallet backup, the recovery seed, is entered entirely on the OneKey Model T, through the device screen. We avoid passing any of your sensitive information to a potentially insecure computer or web browser.
TR_CHECK_YOUR_DEVICE: 检查您的 OneKey 屏幕
TR_CHOOSE_BETWEEN_NO_PASSPHRASE: 访问无 passphrase 的标准钱包或带 passphrase 的隐藏钱包。
TR_CLEAR_STORAGE_DESCRIPTION: 重置应用可将其恢复为默认设置；这是进行任何故障排除的良好第一步。该应用程序将在流程结束时自行重启。
TR_COINS_SETTINGS_ALSO_DEFINES: Suite 支持以下代币，启用代币来使 OneKey Suite 确定需要连接到哪些网络。
TR_CONFIRM_ACTION_ON_YOUR: 请按照 OneKey 屏幕上的说明进行操作
TR_CONFIRM_EMPTY_HIDDEN_WALLET_ON: Confirm empty Hidden wallet on "{deviceLabel}" device.
TR_CONFIRM_PASSPHRASE_SOURCE: 请在"{deviceLabel}"设备确认空的隐藏钱包 passphrase 来源。
TR_CONNECTED_DEVICE_IS_IN_BOOTLOADER: 当前 OneKey 设备处于 bootloader 模式。请断开 OneKey 的连接，然后重新连接以继续设置过程。
TR_CONNECT_TREZOR: 请连接并解锁您的 OneKey
TR_CONNECT_YOUR_DEVICE_AGAIN: 请重新连接您的 OneKey 设备
TR_CONNECT_YOUR_TREZOR_TO_CHECK: 请连接您的 OneKey 以验证此地址
TR_COULD_NOT_RETRIEVE_DATA_FOR: *Could not retrieve data for {accountsCount} {accountsCount, plural, one {account} other {accounts}}
TR_DARK_MODE_DESCRIPTION: 在深色背景上使用浅色文本、图标和图形用户界面元素的配色方案。
TR_DETECTING_BRIDGE: 监测到 OneKey Bridge 已安装
TR_DEVICE_DISCONNECTED_DURING_ACTION: 设备在操作中断开连接
TR_DEVICE_DISCONNECTED_DURING_ACTION_DES: 您的 OneKey 在备份过程中已断开连接。 我们强烈建议您使用 Suite 设置中的恢复出厂设置选项来擦除设备并再次开始钱包备份过程。
TR_DEVICE_IN_BOOTLOADER: 您的 OneKey 目前正在 bootloader 模式。
TR_DEVICE_IN_BOOTLOADER_EXPLAINED: 在 bootloader 模式下，设备已准备就绪，可以接收固件更新，但是这也意味着它无法进行任何其他操作。要恢复到正常模式，只需重新连接即可。
TR_DEVICE_IN_RECOVERY_MODE: 您的设备处于恢复模式。
TR_DEVICE_IS_IN_UNEXPECTED_MODE: 设备处于意外模式。在下一步中，系统将要求您正常重新连接设备。
TR_DEVICE_IS_USED_IN_OTHER_WINDOW_TEXT: 您的 OneKey 似乎正在另一个窗口中使用。请关闭所有其他可能正在使用 OneKey 的窗口或标签。
TR_DEVICE_NOT_INITIALIZED_TEXT: 我们将帮助您完成整个过程
TR_DEVICE_NOT_RECOGNIZED_TRY_BRIDGE: OneKey 无法识别？ 尝试安装 {link}.
TR_DEVICE_NOT_RECOGNIZED_TRY_UDEV: OneKey 无法识别？ 尝试安装 {link}.
TR_DEVICE_SETTINGS_CHANGE_PIN_DESC: 如果您的 PIN 已经公开，或者您只想更改它，则可以在此处重置，您可以随时更改 PIN 码。
TR_DEVICE_SETTINGS_HOMESCREEN_IMAGE_SETT: Supports PNG or JPG, 144 x 144 pixels
TR_DEVICE_SETTINGS_PASSPHRASE_DESC: passphrase 会在您的恢复种子中添加自定义短语（例如单词，句子或字符串），这将创建一个隐藏的钱包。每个隐藏的钱包都可以使用自己的密码，您的标准钱包无需密码即可访问。
TR_DEVICE_SETTINGS_PASSPHRASE_DESC_MORE: 不要忘记您的 passphrase，与日常的密码不同，隐藏钱包的 passphrase 无法找回，您的资金将永久丢失。
TR_DEVICE_SETTINGS_PIN_PROTECTION_DESC: 设置强 PIN 密码是保护设备免遭未经授权的物理访问并保护资金的主要方法之一。
TR_DID_YOU_PURCHASE: Please note, that device packaging including holograms have changed over time. You can check packaging details {TR_PACKAGING_LINK}. Also be sure you made your purchase from {TR_RESELLERS_LINK}. Otherwise, the device you are holding in your hands might be a counterfeit. Please {TR_CONTACT_OUR_SUPPORT_LINK}
TR_DISCONNECT_YOUR_DEVICE: 请断开您的 OneKey 设备
TR_DOWNLOAD_LATEST_BRIDGE: 下载最新的 OneKey bridge 版本 {version}
TR_DO_NOT_DISCONNECT: 请不要断开 OneKey 设备的连接
TR_DROPZONE: Drag and drop file here or click to select from files
TR_DRY_RUN_CHECK_ITEM_DESCRIPTION: Note that this test is precisely the same as the normal recovery process. You should only trust the information and instructions displayed on your OneKey screen.
TR_DRY_RUN_CHECK_ITEM_TITLE: I understand this is simulated check and it won’t affect my seed
TR_EJECT_WALLET_EXPLANATION: 立即从 Suite 中删除所有钱包数据。
TR_ENABLE_PASSPHRASE_DESCRIPTION: 允许您创建隐藏的钱包
TR_ENTER_ALL_WORDS_IN_CORRECT: 以正确的顺序输入所有单词
TR_ENTER_PASSPHRASE_ON_DEVICE: 在 OneKey 上输入 passphrase
TR_ENTER_SEED_WORDS_INSTRUCTION: Enter the words from your seed here in the order displayed on your device.
TR_EXCHANGE_CONFIRM_ON_TREZOR_SEND: 在 OneKey 上确认 & 发送
TR_EXCHANGE_CREATE_SUITE_ACCOUNT: 创建一个新的 {symbol} 账户
TR_EXCHANGE_DETAIL_ERROR_TEXT: Sorry, your transaction failed or was rejected. Your coins have not been exchanged.
TR_EXCHANGE_DETAIL_KYC_TEXT: The provider has marked this transaction as "suspicious"; you may be required to complete their KYC process to finish the trade. Please contact the provider's support to proceed.
TR_EXCHANGE_FEES_INCLUDED_INFO: What you see is close to what you'll get—the amount shown is the best estimate of the final amount you'll receive, all exchange fees included. For float-rate offers, there may be slight changes between accepting the offer and completing the transaction.
TR_EXCHANGE_FIXED_OFFERS_INFO: Fixed rates show you exactly how much you'll end up with at the end of the exchange—the amount won't change between when you select the rate and when your transaction is complete. You're guaranteed the amount shown, but these rates are usually less generous, meaning your money won't buy as much crypto.
TR_EXCHANGE_FLOAT_OFFERS_INFO: Floating rates mean that the final amount you'll get may change slightly due to fluctuations in the market between when you select the rate and when your transaction is complete. These rates are usually higher, meaning you could end up with more crypto in the end.
TR_EXCHANGE_I_UNDERSTAND: I understand and agree to all of the above
TR_EXCHANGE_KYC_INFO: "Know your customer" (KYC) refers to providing identifying information to the exchange provider, usually a phone number and a copy of an identification document. This varies from provider to provider and may depend on the amount you're exchanging, so check this information carefully before proceeding.
TR_EXCHANGE_NO_OFFERS: Sorry, none of our partners can provide an offer at this time.
TR_EXCHANGE_RECEIVE_ACCOUNT_QUESTION_TOO: This is the account within your wallet where you'll find your coins once the transaction is finished.
TR_EXCHANGE_RECEIVE_ADDRESS_QUESTION_TOO: This is the specific alphanumeric address that will receive your coins. Verify this address on your OneKey.
TR_EXCHANGE_RECEIVING_ADDRESS_INFO: Your address is where you'll receive your {symbol}.
TR_EXCHANGE_TERMS_1: You're here to exchange cryptocurrency. If you were directed to this site for any other reason, please contact {provider} support before proceeding.
TR_EXCHANGE_TERMS_2: You're using this feature to exchange funds that will be sent to an account under your direct personal control.
TR_EXCHANGE_TERMS_3: You're not using this feature for gambling or any other violation of the provider’s terms of service.
TR_EXCHANGE_TERMS_4: You understand that cryptocurrencies are an emerging financial tool and that regulations may be limited in some areas. This may put you at a higher risk of fraud, theft, or market instability.
TR_EXCHANGE_TERMS_5: You understand that cryptocurrency transactions are irreversible and you won’t be able to receive a refund for your purchase.
TR_EXCHANGE_USE_NON_SUITE_ACCOUNT: Use a {symbol} account that isn't in Suite
TR_FAILED_BACKUP: Backup failed. Please wipe your OneKey and start the setup process again.
TR_FIAT_RATES_NOT_AVAILABLE_TOOLTIP: Fiat rates are not currently available.
TR_FINAL_SUBHEADING: 您的 OneKey 已设置好并可以在 Suite 中开始使用！
TR_FIRMWARE_INSTALLED: Ready to go! The latest firmware has been installed.
TR_FIRMWARE_INSTALLED_TEXT: 当前设备已安装固件版本： {version} 。
TR_FIRMWARE_IS_POTENTIALLY_RISKY: Updating firmware is potentially risky operation. If anything goes wrong (broken cable etc.) device might end up in wiped state which effectively means losing all your coins.
TR_FIRMWARE_SUBHEADING: Your OneKey is shipped without any firmware, so you can install the latest version directly by clicking the button below. When your device starts up, it will confirm that the firmware is authentic or display a warning.
TR_FIRMWARE_UPDATE_REQUIRED_EXPLAINED: Your device has firmware that is no longer supported. You will need to update it.
TR_FOLLOW_INSTRUCTIONS_ON_DEVICE: 检查您的 OneKey 屏幕
TR_FOR_EASIER_AND_SAFER_INPUT: Please hold the QR code in front of your computer webcam.
TR_FOUND_OK_DEVICE: 您的 OneKey 钱包是空的；在连接 Suite 之前，我们需要再检查一下。
TR_GRAPH_MISSING_DATA: XRP and ERC20 token transactions are included in the balance, but not currently supported in the graph view
TR_HELP_TREZOR_SUITE_TEXT_1: Help Suite become a better product by sharing your {TR_HELP_TREZOR_SUITE_TEXT_1_FAT}.
TR_HELP_TREZOR_SUITE_TEXT_2: All data is kept strictly anonymous; we only use it to improve the OneKey ecosystem.
TR_HIDDEN_WALLET_MODAL_DESCRIPTION: Passphrase 是添加到恢复种子中的自定义单词，句子或字符串，输入一个新的 Passphrase 将创建一个新的隐藏钱包。
TR_HIDDEN_WALLET_TOOLTIP: Passphrase 会在您的助记词中添加自定义短语（例如单词，句子或字符串），这将创建一个隐藏的钱包。每个隐藏的钱包都可以使用自己的 Passphrase，但您的标准钱包无需密码即可访问。
TR_HOLD_LEFT_BUTTON: Hold both buttons while connecting the cable.
TR_HOLOGRAM_STEP_SUBHEADING: 确保保护您设备的包装完好无损。
TR_IF_YOUR_DEVICE_IS_EVER_LOST: 如果您的OneKey丢失或损坏，您的资金将不可挽回。
TR_IF_YOU_NEVER_HAD_WALLET: 创建一个全新的钱包来使用
TR_INSTRUCTION_TO_SKIP: 您应该跳过设置过程，继续使用钱包，并检查此设备上是否有任何资金。
TR_INVALID_FILE_SELECTED: 选择的文件无效。必须为 .jpg 或 .png 结尾的文件
TR_IS_NOT_NEW_DEVICE: 您表示尚未使用此 OneKey 。但是，我们已经检测到预装的固件。这可能会使您的资金面临风险。如果您没有安装此固件，请联系 OneKey 支持。
TR_IS_NOT_NEW_DEVICE_HEADING: 您的 OneKey 已被使用
TR_I_AM_IN_SAFE_PRIVATE_OR: 您在远离相机的安全私密空间或公共空间中
TR_I_HAVE_A_USED_DEVICE: 我曾经使用过这个 OneKey
TR_I_HAVE_ENOUGH_TIME_TO_DO: 您有足够的时间备份您的钱包
TR_I_UNDERSTAND_PASSPHRASE: 我已明白, passphrases 与日常密码不同，无法检索
TR_I_UNDERSTAND_SEED_IS_IMPORTANT: 您有责任确保备份安全
TR_I_WANT_TO_BE_GUIDED_THROUGH: 我们将指导您完成设置过程。
TR_LABELING_FEATURE_ALLOWS: 通过标签可以重命名您的钱包，帐户和地址。 通过与 Dropbox 或 Google 云端硬盘同步来应用标签。
TR_LANDING_DESC: For testing purposes only. Please keep in mind this is a beta version.

TR_LOOKING_FOR_QUICK_EASY: Looking for a quick & easy way to buy BTC? We got you covered.
TR_LTC_ADDRESS_INFO: Litecoin changed the format of addresses. Find more info about how to convert your address on our blog. {TR_LEARN_MORE}
TR_MAKE_SURE_NO_ONE_CAN_PEEK: 确保没有人或相机等设备可以窥视您的屏幕和设备。确保除了您之外，没有人会看到您的备份。
TR_MAXIMUM_LENGTH_IS_9_DIGITS: 在键盘上输入最多9位数字。
TR_MAX_LABEL_LENGTH_IS: 名称最多可以 {length} 字符。
TR_MODELS_DESC: OneKey One features two buttons and a monochromatic screen, OneKey T is the high-end model featuring touch-screen display.
TR_MODEL_ONE_DESC: Two buttons and a monochromatic screen
TR_MY_DEVICE_IS_INITIALIZED: 连接 Suite 之前，我们将询问您最后一个安全问题。
TR_NEEDS_ATTENTION_INITIALIZE: OneKey has not been set up.
TR_NEEDS_ATTENTION_SEEDLESS: OneKey does not have recovery seed.
TR_NEEDS_ATTENTION_UNACQUIRED: OneKey is already in use in another window.
TR_NEW_COMMUNICATION_TOOL: New communication tool to facilitate the connection between your OneKey and your internet browser.
TR_NEW_TREZOR_FIRMWARE_IS_AVAILABLE_DOT: New OneKey firmware is available! Please update your device.
TR_NO_FIRMWARE_EXPLAINED: 在使用设备前，您需要先安装固件。
TR_NO_SEARCH_RESULTS: 没有符合您搜索条件的结果
TR_OFFER_FEE_INFO: The amount shown is the final amount you'll receive, with provider exchange fees included. However, your bank may charge additional currency exchange fees if your bank account is not denominated in the chosen currency.
TR_ONCE_YOU_BEGIN_THIS_PROCESS: 此过程仅需几分钟，但是一旦开始就无法暂停或重新启动。

TR_ONLY_2_MORE_STEPS: 但是，如果您没有使用私人电脑，或者只想测试 Suite，则可以跳过此步骤。

TR_OPEN_IN_BLOCK_EXPLORER: 在区块链浏览器中打开
TR_OUTDATED_BRIDGE_DESKTOP: The OneKey Suite application comes with OneKey Bridge bundled. If you only use the OneKey Suite application, we recommend you to uninstall OneKey Bridge in order to use the bundled one. If you are using OneKey in your browser as well, updating OneKey Bridge is recommended.
TR_PAIR_TREZOR_AGAIN_OR_NEW: Pair OneKey device again with your internet browser or pair another device
TR_PAIR_YOUR_TREZOR: Pair your OneKey again with your computer
TR_PASSPHRASE_TOO_LONG: Passphrase length has exceed the allowed limit.
TR_PIN_ERROR_TROUBLESHOOT: 不确定 PIN 的工作方式？您可以随时参考我们的 {TR_DOCUMENTATION}
TR_PIN_SET_SUCCESS: 写下您的 PIN 码，并保证其安全，同时与助记词分开。每当您要访问 OneKey 时，请输入您的PIN。
TR_PIN_SUBHEADING: 使用强的 PIN 码可以保护 OneKey 免受未经授权的物理访问。
TR_PLEASE_ALLOW_YOUR_CAMERA: 为了能够扫描二维码，请您允许相机权限
TR_PLEASE_CONNECT_YOUR_DEVICE: 请连接您的设备以继续验证的过程。
TR_PLEASE_ENABLE_PASSPHRASE: 请启用 passphrase 设置以继续进行验证过程。
TR_RANDOM_SEED_WORDS_DISCLAIMER: You may be asked to type some words that are not part of your recovery seed.
TR_RECONNECT_IN_BOOTLOADER: Reconnect your OneKey in bootloader mode
TR_RECONNECT_TEXT: We lost connection with your OneKey. This could mean:
TR_RECONNECT_TROUBLESHOOT_BRIDGE: OneKey Bridge might have stopped working; try restarting it.
TR_RECONNECT_TROUBLESHOOT_CABLE: Your cable isn't working; try a different one.
TR_RECONNECT_TROUBLESHOOT_CONNECTION: Your device isn't fully connected via the cable; check your connections.
TR_RECOVERY_SEED_IS: The process of creating a list of words in a specific order which store all the information needed to recover a wallet.
TR_RECOVERY_SEED_IS_OFFLINE: 恢复种子是您钱包的离线备份
TR_RECOVERY_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: Both methods are secure; advanced recovery allows you to input your recovery seed using your OneKey screen and takes slightly longer.
TR_RECOVER_SUBHEADING: 如果要恢复现有的钱包，可以使用助记词进行恢复，请选择助记词中的单词数。
TR_RECOVER_SUBHEADING_MODEL_T: Using a OneKey Model T, the entire recovery process is done on the device's touchscreen.
TR_REMEMBER_ALLOWS_YOU_TO: Stores wallet for a watch-only mode: You will see your wallet even if device is disconnected.
TR_RESELLERS_LINK: 我们值得信赖的经销商
TR_SEALED_PACKAGE_THAT: 您以前从未使用过此设备，并且想要对其进行检查。
TR_SECURITY_CHECKPOINT_GOT_SEED: 安全检查：您有助记词吗？
TR_SECURITY_HEADING: 您的钱包就快设置完成了
TR_SECURITY_SUBHEADING: 您已经成功设置了 OneKey 并创建了钱包，切勿在未备份的情况下使用 OneKey，使用备份是找回丢失的钱包的唯一方法。
TR_SEEDLESS_MODE_EXPLAINED: Seedless mode means that device has cryptographic secret inside but no corresponding recovery seed exists. Such devices are not allowed to be used with this wallet.
TR_SEED_CHECK_SUCCESS_DESC: Your seed is valid and has just been successfully checked. Please take great care of it and/or hide it back where you are going to find it.
TR_SELECT_DEVICE_STATUS: 请问您之前是否使用过此 OneKey 设备？
TR_SELECT_NUMBER_OF_WORDS: 选择您的助记词单词数
TR_SELECT_PASSPHRASE_SOURCE: Select where to enter passphrase on "{deviceLabel}" .
TR_SEND_GAS_LIMIT_TOOLTIP: Gas limit refers to the maximum amount of gas user is willing to spend on a particular transaction. Transaction fee = gas limit * gas price. Increasing the gas limit will not get the transaction confirmed sooner. Default value for sending ETH is {defaultGasLimit}
TR_SEND_GAS_PRICE_TOOLTIP: Gas price refers to the amount of ether you are willing to pay for every unit of gas, and is usually measured in “Gwei”. Transaction fee = gas limit * gas price. Increasing the gas price will get the transaction confirmed sooner but makes it more expensive. The recommended gas price is {defaultGasPrice} GWEI.
TR_SET_STRONG_PIN_NUMBER_AGAINST: 保护您的 OneKey 防止未经授权的访问
TR_SET_UP_NEW_PIN: 输入您的新 PIN 码
TR_SET_UP_STRONG_PIN_TO_PROTECT: 设置强的 PIN 码是保护设备免遭未经授权的物理访问并保护资金的主要方法之一。
TR_SKIP_ONBOARDING_TEXT: 如果是您亲自设置的 OneKey，并且以前成功使用 OneKey 连接过其他 Web 界面或 Suite，才应点击继续进行连接操作；如果有其他人帮助您设置，您的资金可能会面临风险。
TR_SKIP_SECURITY: 跳过备份设置和 PIN 设置
TR_SPEND_LEAVE_MODAL_INFO: Suite is communicating with Bitrefill; do not leave this tab.
TR_SPEND_PROVIDER_CONTENT: This content is fully provided by our partner
TR_SPEND_PROVIDER_CONTENT_WINDOW: Spend content is fully provided by our partner Bitrefill. You’ll choose your purchase on their website and finish the transaction in OneKey Suite.
TR_SUITE_WEB_LANDING_BOTTOM_HEADLINE: Dozens of brand-new features to discover.{lineBreak}Try Suite now.
TR_SUITE_WEB_LANDING_FEATURES_1_TEXT: Enhanced security and privacy, new design and improved performance, all in one software suite.
TR_SUITE_WEB_LANDING_FEATURES_2_TEXT: Compare competitive rates, buy and exchange coins within OneKey's secure environment. Powered by +Invity.
TR_SUITE_WEB_LANDING_FEATURES_3_TEXT: ETH, XRP, ETC and more now supported directly through the app.
TR_SUITE_WEB_LANDING_HEADLINE: Managing crypto just got{lineBreak}safer and easier
TR_SUITE_WEB_LANDING_SUB_HEADLINE: Take control of your OneKey with our desktop & browser app.
TR_SWIPE_YOUR_FINGERS: Swipe your finger across the touchscreen while connecting cable.
TR_TAKE_ME_BACK_TO_WALLET: Take me back to the wallet
TR_TESTNET_COINS_EXPLAINED: 测试网的代币没有货币价值，它们是无风险尝试 OneKey Suite 各种功能的工具。
TR_THE_PIN_LAYOUT_IS_DISPLAYED: 检查您的 OneKey 屏幕来获得键盘布局。
TR_THIS_HIDDEN_WALLET_IS_EMPTY: This hidden wallet is empty. To make sure you are in the correct hidden wallet, please type the passphrase again.
TR_THIS_HIDDEN_WALLET_IS_EMPTY_SOURCE: This hidden wallet is empty. To make sure you are in the correct hidden wallet, please type again the passphrase on OneKey.
TR_THIS_IS_PLACE_TO_SEE_ALL: This is the place to manage all your wallets and OneKey devices.
TR_THIS_TREZOR_IS_ALREADY_SET_UP: This OneKey is already set up
TR_TOR_BRIDGE: Bridge not working in Tor Browser?
TR_TOR_DESCRIPTION: Enabling this will route all of Suite's traffic through the Tor network.{lineBreak}All requests to OneKey infrastructure will be pointed to our Tor services, increasing your privacy and security.
TR_TOR_PARAM_DESCRIPTION: You can configure the address to point to a different Tor instance. Default: 127.0.0.1:9050.
TR_TOS_INFORMATION: By clicking Continue you agree to our {TR_TOS_LINK}
TR_TO_ACCESS_OTHER_WALLETS: Connect your device to add other wallets
TR_TO_ACCESS_STANDARD_NO_PASSPHRASE: The default built-in wallet derived from your recovery seed.
TR_TO_ADD_NEW_ACCOUNT_PLEASE_CONNECT: Connect your device to add new account.
TR_TO_ADD_NEW_ACCOUNT_WAIT_FOR_DISCOVERY: Accounts are still loading. Please wait before adding a new one.
TR_TO_FIND_YOUR_ACCOUNTS_AND: OneKey is running a coin discovery check to find your accounts and funds.
TR_TO_MAKE_YOUR_LABELS_PERSISTENT: To make your labels persistent and available on different devices connect to cloud storage provider.
TR_TO_PREVENT_PHISHING_ATTACKS_COMMA: To prevent phishing attacks, you should verify the address on your OneKey. {claim}
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TIP_1: Tip: You can search for transaction IDs, addresses, labels, amounts and dates.
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TIP_10: Tip: You can combine AND (&) and OR (|) operators for more complex searches. For example For example > 2020-12-01 & < 2020-12-31 | > 2020-12-01 & < 2020-12-31 will show all all transactions in January 2020 or December 2020.
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TIP_2: Tip: You can use the greater than (>) and lesser than (<) symbols on amount searches. For example <strong>> 1<strong> will show all transactions that have an amount of 1 or higher.
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TIP_3: Tip: You can search for exact amounts using the equal (=) symbol. For example = 0.01 will show only transactions that have an amount of exactly 0.01.
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TIP_4: Tip: You can exclude an amount by using the exlamation mark and equal symbols together (!=). For example = -0.01 will show all transactions except the ones with an amount of -0.01.
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TIP_5: Tip: Dates can be searched using the YYYY-MM-DD format. For example 2020-12-14 will show all transactions on December 14th, 2020.
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TIP_6: Tip: You can use greater than (>) and lesser than (<) symbols on date searches. For example <strong>> 2020-12-01<strong> will show all transactions on and after December 1st, 2020.
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TIP_7: Tip: You can exclude a date by using the exlamation mark and equal symbols together (!=). For example != 2020-12-14 will show all transactions except the ones on December 14th, 2020.
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TIP_8: Tip: You can display results matching at least one of multiple searches by grouping them with the OR operator (|). For example 2020-12-31 | 2021-01-01 will show all transactions that have happened on the 31st of December 2020 or 1st of January 2021.
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TIP_9: Tip: You can display results matching multiple searches by grouping them with the AND operator (&). For example > 2020-12-01 & < 2020-12-31 & > 0 will show all incoming (amount higher than 0) transactions in December 2020.
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TOOLTIP: Search by transaction ID, label or amount or use operators such as < > | & = !=.
TR_UDEV_DOWNLOAD_DESC: In some cases, Linux users need to install udev rules to access their device. Please install the following package and reconnect your OneKey.
TR_UNKNOWN_ERROR_SEE_CONSOLE: Unknown error. See console logs for details.
TR_UNPACKED_DEVICE_THAT: 您过去曾经使用过此 OneKey，并信任它。
TR_UNREADABLE_EXPLAINED: We cant see details about your device. It might be OneKey with old firmware or possibly any USB device. To make communication possible, you will need to install OneKey Bridge.
TR_UNVERIFIED_ADDRESS_COMMA_CONNECT: Unverified address, connect your OneKey to verify it
TR_UPDATE_MODAL_INSTALL_NOW_OR_LATER: Would you like to install the update now?
TR_USED_IN_ANOTHER_WINDOW: 在另一个浏览器窗口或是 APP 使用了当前设备
TR_USER_HAS_NOT_WORKED_WITH_THIS_DEVICE: It is a brand new device, just unpacked
TR_USER_HAS_NOT_WORKED_WITH_THIS_DEVICE_: In that case you should immediately contact OneKey support with detailed information on your purchase and refrain from using this device.
TR_USER_HAS_WORKED_WITH_THIS_DEVICE: I have worked with it before
TR_USING_EITHER_YOUR_SINGLE_BACKUP: 如果您有另一个钱包的助记词或 Shamir 备份，则可以选择还原它
TR_USING_TOUCHSCREEN: Using the touchscreen display you enter all the words in the correct order until completed.
TR_WALLET_DUPLICATE_DESC: The Hidden wallet you are trying to add has been already discovered.
TR_WALLET_SELECTION_ENTER_EXISTING_PASSP: Extension of the wallet derived from recovery seed by your own chosen input.
TR_WELCOME_TO_TREZOR: 开始设置或是直接连接？
TR_WELCOME_TO_TREZOR_TEXT: 选择设置设备或继续使用 Suite
TR_WELCOME_TO_TREZOR_TEXT_WALLET_CREATIO: 创建一个新的钱包或通过助记词从备份中还原。
TR_WHAT_IS_PASSPHRASE: 了解更多关于差异的内容
TR_WIPE_DEVICE_CHECKBOX_1_DESCRIPTION: 与现有帐户关联的所有数据将被删除，您将需要恢复种子来恢复您的钱包。
TR_WIPE_DEVICE_CHECKBOX_1_TITLE: 我了解此操作会删除设备上的所有数据
TR_WIPE_DEVICE_CHECKBOX_2_DESCRIPTION: 仅当您已创建助记词时，您的资产才是安全的，确保您有助记词，或者您知道将助记词保存在哪里。
TR_WIPE_DEVICE_CHECKBOX_2_TITLE: 我了解此操作不会影响到我的资金
TR_WIPE_DEVICE_TEXT: 重置设备将删除其所有数据，仅当您有助记词或设备上没有任何资金时，才重置设备。
TR_WIPING_YOUR_DEVICE: 这将删除此 OneKey 的所有数据，包括其助记词，仅当手头有助记词或此设备上没有存储资金时，才能擦除设备。
TR_WORD_DOES_NOT_EXIST: 单词 "{word}" 不存在于 bip39 标准助记词列表中。
TR_WRONG_PIN_ENTERED_DESCRIPTION: Did you notice that matrix on your device has changed?
TR_XRP_RESERVE_INFO: Ripple addresses require a minimum balance of {minBalance} XRP to activate and maintain the account.
TR_YOUR_DEVICE_IS_CONNECTED_BUT_UNREADAB: Your device is connected properly, but your internet browser can not communicate with it at the moment. You will need to install OneKey Bridge.
TR_YOUR_DEVICE_IS_SEEDLESS: Your device is in seedless mode and is not allowed to be used with this wallet.
TR_YOUR_LABELING_IS_SYNCED: Your labeling is synced with cloud storage provider. Your data are safe, only your OneKey can decrypt them.
TR_YOUR_LABELING_IS_SYNCED_LOCALLY: Labels are saved locally on your machine.
TR_YOUR_TREZOR_IS_ALMOST_READY: 你的 OneKey 设置就快要完成了
TR_YOUR_TREZOR_IS_NOT_BACKED_UP: 您的 OneKey 钱包尚未备份。
TR_YOU_CAN_SELECT_EITHER: 您是第一次使用此 OneKey 还是以前已经使用过？
TR_YOU_EITHER_HAVE_T1: You either have a seed containing 12, 18 or 24 words.
TR_YOU_EITHER_HAVE_T2: You either have a seed containing 12, 18, 20, 24, 33 words.
TR_YOU_MAY_CHOSE_EITHER_STANDARD: New wallets are created based on the type of recovery seed you use to back up your wallet.
TR_YOU_MAY_EITHER_UPDATE: A new firmware version is available. You can also update your OneKey directly from Suite once you have finished setting up your device.
TX_CONFIRMATIONS_EXPLAIN: Number of confirmations by the network through the mining process
TR_SUITE_META_DESCRIPTION: New desktop & browser app for OneKey hardware wallets. OneKey Suite brings big improvements across our three key pillars of usability, security and privacy.
